favorites.title: Apocalypse Truck
favorites.description: When the virus hit, cities crumbled, people vanished.  The world went silent except for the groans of the undead.  You’re on…nly hope is a beat-up monster truck, with some spikes, plates, and just enough horsepower to push through the zombie chaos.

favorites.title: Kick the Pirate
favorites.description: You’re sick of his squawking. Fire this annoying pirate out of a cannon and straight into some karma.
